mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(case when (t.`status`=1 or t.`status`=2) then 3 end)as process, COUNT(case when t.`status`=3 then 1 end)as complete, COUNT(case when t.complete_time>t.end_time then 1 end)as delay, SUM(case when t.`status`=1 then tu.task_hours else 0 end) as hours, u.`name`,tu.user_id as id from task_user tu,`user` u, task t where t.id = tu.task_id AND tu.user_id = u.id GROUP BY user_id
